long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📱 Instagram Comments Scraper

This powerful Chrome extension helps you easily extract, analyze, and manage Instagram comments and user interactions. 🚀

Key Features And Usage:
• 💬 Extract comments and replies from any Instagram post
• 👥 Collect user details and engagement metrics
• 🔢 Set limit for comments to scrape
• 👆 One-click data collection
• 📊 Export data in multiple formats: CSV, JSON, HTML, Excel, XML
• ✅ Customizable export fields
• 📅 Collect comment date and time
• 👍 Track engagement metrics
• 😊 Analyze sentiment trends
• 🔄 Monitor user interactions
• 📝 Extract comment text and mentions
• 👤 Get user profile information
• 🔗 Capture comment URLs
• 📜 View and manage historical tasks
• 🔄 Resume interrupted tasks
• 🏪 Discover more useful extensions powered by us

Ideal for:
• 📈 Social media analysis
• 🎯 Community management
• 📡 Brand monitoring
• 🕵️ Influencer research
• 💡 Audience insights

How to use:
1. 🛠️ After installation, click the extension icon
2. 🔗 Enter the Instagram post URL
3. 🔢 Set the number of comments to analyze
4. 🚀 Click "Start"
6. ⏳ Wait for data collection
7. 💾 Download in your chosen format

This extension provides an efficient solution for Instagram comment analysis. Perfect for social media managers, community managers, researchers, and brand analysts looking to gain valuable insights from user interactions. Explore our Store tab for more powerful tools to enhance your social media analysis. 💼🎯📊

🚀 Install now and unlock deeper Instagram engagement insights!
